name: Spookey Cellar Scramble
description:
Synopsis

In Spookey Cellar Scramble players are locked in an odd otherworldly cellar and must find the hidden key in order to escape. With the help of your ghostly friend, throw, break, and smash objects in the hopes of finding the key to your escape before something else finds you…

Controls

            Arrows Keys:           Move

            Space Bar:                  Pick-up / Throw Objects

(The BGM is "Sewer Dungeon" from Okage: Shadow King I did not make it)
